summary: An Ordinance amending Section 2, of Ordinance Number 17313, entitled, "An Ordinance requiring the Board of Public Works to furnish estimates of the cost of maintenance of permanent pavements, and authorizing the Board of Public Works to receive bids and execute contracts for the maintenance of permanent pavements for certain specified periods, and providing for the pavement therefor from the General Fund," approved November 5th, 1907.
